title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping                    On a whaleship there were no options as to accommodations or cuisine. Aren’t you glad that in New Bedford today you can pick and choose to meet your taste and comfort?                Below you can find links to help you plan your visit. So come to New Bedford, kick off your shoes and stay awhile.       Destination New Bedford's   Eating Sleeping   Or download Downtown New Bedford Inc. Visitor Guide.
